sentences.sContent: What that kangaroo did to this courtyard .
sentences.sContent_eng: What that kangaroo did to this courtyard .
sentences.sCn: 那袋鼠在这院子做了什么。

sentences.sContent: But in a kangaroo court of a Banana Republic, they are doomed to fail.
sentences.sContent_eng: But in a kangaroo court of a Banana Republic, they are doomed to fail.
sentences.sCn: 但是在香蕉共和国的袋鼠法院，国亲律师团他们是被注定失败的。

phrases.pCn: n. 袋鼠岛（澳大利亚岛，等于坎加鲁岛）

trans.tranOther: an Australian animal that moves by jumping and carries its babies in a pouch (= a special pocket of skin ) on its stomach
